an4.304:4.1: “Of hate … delusion … anger … hostility … denigration … insolence … envy … stinginess … deceit … manipulation … obstinacy … aggression … conceit … arrogance … vanity … negligence … for insight … complete understanding … finishing … giving up … ending … vanishing … fading away … cessation … giving away … letting go … four things should be developed.”
an4.304:8.1: The Book of the Fours is finished.
